song.title: Pieni ja ihmeellinen (Westis Remix)
song.info:
Westis' Comment: My remix of a great song by a Finnish electronic pop group called Retropop.
Lyrics: Se on ihmeellistä Kun matkalla tajunnassa Kaikki loppuu aikanaan Täytyy vaihtaa maisemaa
Pieni ja ihmeellinen on maailmamme Pieni ja ihmeellinen on planeettamme Jota Maaksi kutsutaan
Jossain on paikka teille Siellä on tilaa vieläjo Ei saa luovuttaa Etsikää uudestaan
Translation (Google translate):
It is amazing When the consciousness of the way All the time runs out Need a change of scenery
refrain: A small and wonderful world is A small and wonderful is our planet That Earth is defined as (2x)
It is amazing When there is no enough All the time runs out Need a change of scenery
refrain (2x)
Somewhere there is a place for you There is still room to improve Do not dispose of Look again
A lot of people in the world Not enough space for all All the time runs out Need a change of scenery
refrain (2x)
